Name: maximize_team_utilization
Description: Maximize the average availability of all team workers

Name: minimize_project_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of the project in days

Name: maximize_feature_delivery
Description: Maximize the number of high-priority features delivered

Name: minimize_blocker_impact
Description: Minimize the number of high-severity blockers

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate of successfully achieved sprint goals

Name: minimize_task_effort_variance
Description: Minimize the variance between estimated and actual task effort

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the average satisfaction level of stakeholders

Name: minimize_budget_overrun
Description: Minimize the total project budget overrun

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average velocity of the team

Name: minimize_retrospective_actions
Description: Minimize the number of improvement actions needed (indicator of fewer problems)
